ctx: intros Q a b p q Hreduce Hcanonical Heq.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, b : Term A n x, y, z : list (Term A n) H : reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q x y Hreduce : reduceplus Q y z Hcanonical : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a x) Heq : eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b IHHreduce : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a y) -> reduceplus Q (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a y) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b z) Unable to unify "reduceplus Q (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a y) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b z)" with "reduceplus Q y (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b z)".

original: intros Q a b p q Hreduce Hcanonical Heq. induction Hreduce. - apply eqP_Rstar_0. auto. - apply eqP_Rstar_n with y. + apply reduce_inv with (Q:=Q); auto. + apply IHHreduce; auto.
